Location: West Swan Rd & Woollcott Ave, West Swan
Description: With the new suburbs being built around this area, it is getting more and more busier coming from Ellenbrook direction. This intersection doesn't give you much of an opportunity to cross traffic when it is so busy
Big lines of valley traffic with little chance to join the road or cross to tourist venues.

Location: Gardiner Dr & West Swan Rd, Henley Brook

Description: The footpath/cycle path provisions when travelling between Gnangara and West Swan roads make you cross multiple times a major arterial road to then have a section of around 200m with no adjoining path which requires you to walk or cycle on the road.
Tourists searching for their destination stop and start along the road. People get impatient and make risky decisions when overtaking. There needs to be turning lanes.

West Swan road is always busy with traffic including trucks and b-double trucks. Traffic attempting to enter West Swan road from Woollcott Ave are having to take risks that have resulted in serious and fatal traffic accidents.
